span.span: The namespace contains classes that describe configuration options used by classes.

remarks.format: ## Examples 事务应用程序使用的示例配置文件如下所示：An example configuration file used by your transaction application can be as follows, `` `` `` `` `` `` 此示例指定事务的默认值。This example specifies the default values of a transaction. 具体而言，它将设置负责协调本地启动的所有分布式事务的分布式事务处理协调器（MSDTC）的计算机名，以及事务超时之前的默认时间。此外，它还指定一个只能在计算机级别修改的设置，这是在事务超时之前允许的最大时间量。Specifically, it sets the computer name of the Distributed Transaction Coordinator (MSDTC) that is responsible for coordinating all distributed transactions started locally, and the default time after which a transaction times out. In addition, it specifies a setting that can only be modified at the machine level, which is the maximum amount of time allowed before a transaction times out.
